location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to Henry Willock, HM Charg√© d'affaires at Tehran

mods.abstract: The letter is informing Mr Willock that glassware has arrived for him from Bombay, and requests instructions concerning their 'disposal'. It further notes that two perambulators have been dispatched from Bushire.
